attributes.action: put Menzies Campbell in a retirement home with a nice hot mug of horlicks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sir Menzies Campbell, admirable though he is, is getting on abit. We can all see it, every time he stands in his corner at PMQ's trying to get in on the act. Unfortunately, he is old, dithering, slow, and largely pointless. Therefore, lets put him in a home where he can have a nice life.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
